io.github.ddimitrov.nuggets

Class TextTable.DataBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.ddimitrov.nuggets.TextTable.DataBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    TextTable

    public static class TextTable.DataBuilder
extends Object
    This builder can be used to build a dataset, that can be used together with the specified layout (a set of columns) to create a table.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataBuilder(boolean strict, @NotNull List<TextTable.Column> columns)
      Creates a builder for the specified layout.

        public DataBuilder(boolean strict,
                   @NotNull
                   @NotNull List<TextTable.Column> columns)
        Creates a builder for the specified layout.
        Parameters:
        strict - if true, rows can not specify extra data (unmapped to columns)
        columns - the layout for hte table (defensively copied internally).

      • buildTable

        @NotNull
 @Contract(pure=true)
public @NotNull TextTable buildTable()
        Create a text table with the specified layout and data, that can be used to render the data in tabular format to any appendable (stream or buffer). Both the columns and data are defensively shallow-copied, which means that changes to the columns and rows will visible in the table.
        Returns:
        the text table.
        See Also:
        TextTable.format(int, Appendable)

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
